description: Complete dashboard using metrics from prometheus JMX exporter, with drill down per release > pod

panels.description: Number of messages that have been sent to the broker and Number of messages that have been acknowledged on the broker.
panels.title: Enqueue / Dequeued

panels.description: Number of message consumers subscribed to destinations on the broker and Number of message producers active on destinations on the broker.
panels.title: Consumer/ Producer

panels.description: Number of messages that have been sent to the destination.
panels.title: Queue enqueue Count

panels.description: Number of messages that has been acknowledged (and removed) from the destination.
panels.title: Queue Dequeue Count

title: ActiveMQ
